events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience as a software developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the interview process.
Your initial screening interview went well. We are impressed with your knowledge in software development and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next stage of interviews. Looking forward to moving ahead.
We have successfully scheduled your technical interview with our senior engineering team for April 10th at 10 AM UTC.
The technical interview was completed with positive feedback on your coding abilities and system design knowledge.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your career goals and cultural fit.
The HR interview completed successfully. The team appreciated your professionalism and alignment with company values.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with competitive compensation and great benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We are pleased to hear you are eager to join our engineering team.
You have accepted our job offer. Welcome aboard! We will now begin the onboarding process to get you started.
Your onboarding has officially started. Our team will guide you through all necessary steps to integrate you smoothly into the company.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. We look forward to your contributions as a Software Engineer.
